channel.title: Steens Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Steens Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-78 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 east. Distance to Burns Jct., McDermitt (via US-95) and Winnemucca (Nevada via US-95).

item.title: Lava Bed Road at OR-78
item.description: Lava Bed Road at OR-78. Use OR-78 east to McDermitt and Winnemucca (Nevada); OR-78 west to Crane and Burns.

item.title: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395
item.description: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395 in Burns. Turn right for US-20 East/US-395 North; continue straight for US-20 West/US-395 South.

item.title: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395
item.description: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395
item.description: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395 in Burns. Turn right for US-20 East/US-395 North to John Day (via US-395) and Vale (via US-20). Continue straight for US-20 West/US-395 South to Lakeview (via US-395) and Bend (via US-20).

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395
item.description: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West at OR-205 Junction
item.description: OR-78 West at OR-205 Junction. Turn left for the High Desert Discovery Scenic Byway.

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching OR-205
item.description: OR-78 West approaching OR-205 south to Frenchglen and Denio (Nevada).

item.title: OR-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 west. Distance to Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West - Lawen
item.description: Community of Lawen on OR-78 west.

item.title: OR-78 - Crane Jct.
item.description: OR-78 at Crane Jct. Turn right for Crane, merge left for OR-78 West to Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West - Crane-Buchannan Road Jct.
item.description: OR-78 West approaching Crane-Buchannan Road Jct.

item.title: OR-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 west. Distance to Crane and Burns.

item.title: OR-78 North - French Round Barn/Diamond Jct.
item.description: OR-78 North at French Round Barn/Diamond Jct.

item.title: OR-78 West - Princeton Post Office
item.description: OR-78 west approaching Diamond Jct. Turn left for Princeton Post Office.

item.title: OR-78 West - Diamond Jct.
item.description: OR-78 West approaching Diamond Jct.

item.title: OR-78 West - Harney County
item.description: Entering Harney County on OR-78 west. Many of the eastern Oregon counties have a tagline on their county welcome sign saying “We Honor Veterans”.

item.title: OR-78 West - Fields and Andrews Jct.
item.description: OR-78 West at Fields and Andrews Jct. This road travels south to the Nevada border reaching NV-140 at Denio. The road parallels the east side of Steens Mountain and the Alvord Desert.

item.title: OR-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 west. Distance to Crane and Burns.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-95 south approaching OR-78 to Burns at Burns Jct.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 north at OR-78 in Burns.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching OR-78. Turn left for US-20 East/US-395 North to John Day (via US-395) and Value (via US-20). Continue straight for OR-78 East to Crane and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: End OR-78 East at US-95
item.description: End OR-78 east at US-95. Turn right for US-95 south to McDermitt and Winnemucca (Nevada). Merge left for US-95 north to Jordan Valley and Boise (Idaho).

item.title: End OR-78 East at US-95
item.description: End OR-78 east at US-95. Continue straight for US-95 south; merge left for US-95 north.

item.title: OR-78 East Approaching US-95
item.description: OR-78 East approaching US-95. This is the eastern end of OR-78.

item.title: OR-78 East - Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on OR-78 east.

item.title: End Eastside Steens Mountain Road at OR-78
item.description: End Eastside Steens Mountain Road at OR-78. Turn right on OR-78 for Burns Junction; turn left on OR-78 for Crane. The eastside Steens Mountain road follows the east side of Steens Mountain south to Andrews, Fields, and eventually into Denio, Nevada.

item.title: US-95 North at OR-78
item.description: US-95 north at OR-78 west. Merge left for OR-78 to Burns and Crane. Merge right for US-95 to Jordan Valley and Boise.

item.title: US-95 North At OR-78
item.description: US-95 north at OR-78.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-95 north approaching OR-78. Weight restrictions on US-395 northbound traffic between Mt Vernon and Pilot Rock. OR-78 is the only connecting highway into central Oregon from US-95, and connects to US-20 and US-395 in Burns.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching OR-78 - Length Restrictions
item.description: US-95 north approaching OR-78. Length restrictions on US-395 north traffic ahead. OR-78 is the only road that connects US-95 with the rest of Oregon. OR-78 connects US-95 with US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching OR-78. Stay in the left lane for US-20 East/US-395 North for John Day and Vale.

item.title: US-95 North at OR-78 West
item.description: US-95 north at OR-78 west. Merge left for OR-78 to Burns and Crane. Merge right for US-95 to Jordan Valley and Boise.

item.title: OR-78 East at OR-205 South
item.description: OR-78 east at OR-205 south to Frenchglen and Denio

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20/US-395 north at OR-78 junctio

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20/US-395 north at OR-78 to Crane and Winnemucca

item.title: US-95 South Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-95 south approaching OR-78 to Burns at Burns Jct.
